channel.title: NPR Topics: Culture
channel.description: Art and entertainment commentary plus interviews, book reviews, movie reviews, music reviews, comedy, and visual art. Subscribe to podcasts and follow trends in music, painting, art, architecture, photography, and design.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Remembering Rob Reiner, who made movies for people who love them
item.description: The movies Reiner directed, from A Few Good Men to The Princess Bride, weren't just good — they were people's favorites, the types of films people come back to again and again.
item.content:encoded:
The movies Reiner directed, from A Few Good Men to The Princess Bride, weren't just good — they were people's favorites, the types of films people come back to again and again.

(Image credit: Reed Saxon)
item.dc:creator: Linda Holmes

item.title: A customer's patience 60 years ago was a gift that changed a woman's life
item.description: As a nervous teenage cashier on her first day during the Christmas rush, Stephanie froze at the register — until a customer gently told her, "It's alright. Take your time."
item.content:encoded: As a nervous teenage cashier on her first day during the Christmas rush, Stephanie froze at the register — until a customer gently told her, "It's alright. Take your time."

item.title: Aparna Nancherla jokes that she took a break from standup to stage a 'big comeback'
item.description: NPR's Ailsa Chang talks to comedian Aparna Nancherla about her return to the stage with her first full-length comedy special, Hopeful Potato, and the mental health challenges that kept her away.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Ailsa Chang talks to comedian Aparna Nancherla about her return to the stage with her first full-length comedy special, Hopeful Potato, and the mental health challenges that kept her away.
item.dc:creator: Jonaki Mehta

item.title: Zadie Smith's heads up to young people: 'You are absolutely going to become old'
item.description: Smith was 25 in 2000 when she published her critically acclaimed first novel. Now 50, her latest collection of essays, Dead and Alive, reflects on middle age, climate change and generational gaps.
item.content:encoded:
Dead and Alive. Smith is pictured above at the Rome Film Festival in 2021.'/>

Smith was 25 in 2000 when she published her critically acclaimed first novel. Now 50, her latest collection of essays, Dead and Alive, reflects on middle age, climate change and generational gaps.

(Image credit: Vittorio Zunino Celotto)
item.dc:creator: Terry Gross

item.title: The hidden history of 'White Christmas'
item.description: The tune crooned by Bing Crosby is still one of the most popular Christmas songs of all time. It's endured as a favorite — despite a complicated and controversial history.
item.content:encoded:
The tune crooned by Bing Crosby is still one of the most popular Christmas songs of all time. It's endured as a favorite — despite a complicated and controversial history.

(Image credit: John Springer Collection/CORBIS/Corbis via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Anastasia Tsioulcas

item.title: Trump says Rob Reiner had 'Trump Derangement Syndrome' in post on his death
item.description: Officials are investigating the death of the Hollywood director as a homicide.
item.content:encoded:
Officials are investigating the death of the Hollywood director as a homicide.

(Image credit: Jesse Grant)
item.dc:creator: NPR Washington Desk

item.title: All about character: Jane Austen fans on their favorites
item.description: As Jane Austen fans celebrate the 250th anniversary of her birth, they also celebrate her characters.
item.content:encoded:
As Jane Austen fans celebrate the 250th anniversary of her birth, they also celebrate her characters.

item.description: Bad movies can be fun in their own way.

item.title: Hollywood pays tribute to Rob Reiner; son Nick Reiner arrested
item.description: Los Angeles Police said Sunday that they had opened a homicide investigation after two bodies were found inside the couple's residence.
item.content:encoded:
Los Angeles Police said Sunday that they had opened a homicide investigation after two bodies were found inside the couple's residence.

(Image credit: Kevin Wolf)
item.dc:creator: Mandalit del Barco

item.title: It's the first-ever Pod Club Awards
item.description: In 2025, we laughed, we cried and we learned about ourselves and the world … all with a little help from a podcast. Celebrate this year by revisiting some of our favorite episodes.
item.content:encoded: In 2025, we laughed, we cried and we learned about ourselves and the world … all with a little help from a podcast. Celebrate this year by revisiting some of our favorite episodes.
item.dc:creator: Lauren González
